      • Vehicle

        public Vehicle(int minTankSize,
               int maxTankSize,
               int AOF,
               double pSize,
               boolean randomiseTank,
               boolean randomiseFuel,
               long seed)
        Constructor - Fixed tank size
        Parameters:
        minTankSize - Minimum fuel tank size
        maxTankSize - Maximum fuel tank size
        AOF - Amount of fuel to start with
        pSize - Size of vehicle
        randomiseTank - Whether or not to randomise the fuel tanks size between the min and max values
        randomiseFuel - Whether or not to randomise the amount of fuel the vehicle starts with
        seed - Seed for the random Generator
